00223 #ifdef ENABLE_SUBSCRIPTIONS
00224 
00234 /*
00235  * Used to create and add one or more MonitoredItems to a Subscription. A
00236  * MonitoredItem is deleted automatically by the Server when the Subscription is
00237  * deleted. Deleting a MonitoredItem causes its entire set of triggered item
00238  * links to be deleted, but has no effect on the MonitoredItems referenced by
00239  * the triggered items.
00240  */
00241 void Service_CreateMonitoredItems(UA_Server *server, UA_Session *session,
00242                                        const UA_CreateMonitoredItemsRequest *request, 
00243                                        UA_CreateMonitoredItemsResponse *response);
